description: A trap which signifies that a signature update has occurred.

event.Summary: IDP signature update status: $v4; Detector version: $v1; Security package version: $v2

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSignatureUpdate JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpRunningDetectorVersion s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSecurityPackageVersion s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpLastSignatureUpdateTime t 31536000 JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSignatureUpdateStatus s failure

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSignatureUpdate JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpRunningDetectorVersion s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSecurityPackageVersion s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpLastSignatureUpdateTime t 31536000 JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSignatureUpdateStatus s success

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSignatureUpdate JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpRunningDetectorVersion s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSecurityPackageVersion s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpLastSignatureUpdateTime t 31536000 JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSignatureUpdateStatus s EXAMPLE

description: The version of the detector currently loaded
variables.name: JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpRunningDetectorVersion

description: The version of the security package currently loaded
variables.name: JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSecurityPackageVersion

description: The value of sysUpTime when the signature was last updated
variables.name: JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpLastSignatureUpdateTime

description: The status of the signature update i.e. success or failure
variables.name: JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpSignatureUpdateStatus

description: A trap which signifies that attacks have been detected.
jnxJsIdpAttackName is the name of the attacks that have been
jnxJsIdpAttackHits is the number of times each attack has
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpAttackLog JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpAttackName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpAttackHits c 9999

description: The name of an attack identified by IDP
variables.name: JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpAttackName

description: Number of times an attack has been hit
variables.name: JUNIPER-JS-IDP-MIB::jnxJsIdpAttackHits
